directions: Combine great Northern beans, pinto beans, corn, onions, chicken broth, rotisserie chicken, green chile peppers, hot pepper sauce, oregano, cumin, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a slow cooker.
Cook on Low until flavors combine, about 8 hours.
ingredients: 3 (15.5 ounce) cans great Northern beans, undrained
2 (4 ounce) cans diced green chile peppers, undrained
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Easy Slow Cooker White Chicken Chili
